column1: hero_chalenge_slogan_txt~Take on the challenge and make your epic chronicle
hero_chalenge_rule_txt~1. Complete each day's missions to earn reward and Medal.\n \n 2. Quests are unlocked by day. Unfinished quests from previous days can be continued on the next day.

glory_road_rule_txt~3. Collected medals will be used to progress the Glory Road. Each reward requires a number of Medal to unlock\n \n 4. Players can earn more valuable rewards through the Premium Glory Road by purchase the Buy Now package

column2: remaining Medal will automatically change to Crystals.</color>

column1: glory_road_premium_warning_txt~Require Premium Glory Road to unlock
already_unlock_premium_txt~You already unlocked Premium Glory Road
event_daily_slogan_txt~Acquire Medals and receive great rewards

medal_exchange_txt~<color=#815329>{0}</color> Collected Medal has been converted to <color=#815329>{1}</color> Crystals\n \n Exchange rate: <color=#815329>1</color> Medal = <color=#815329>5</color> Crystals
buy_now_direction_popup~Join <color=#FFD700>{0}</color> event to get this hero and even more resources!
full_basic_progress_notice~You have unlocked the last reward of basic progress.
unlock_premium_progress_notice~But there are still plenty of valuable rewards at <color=#815329>{0}</color>. Let's take them!
claim_hero_notice~Please claim your Hero in Premium Glory Road
hero_mission_rule~Complete missions to receive attractive rewards.\n\n*Note: Quests are only counted during the event time.
